attributes.action: Call a General Election when he resigns.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is an affront to Democracy that the members of a single Parliamentary Party can elect a Prime Minister directly into office on the resignation of his or her predecessor.

rejection.details: A similar petition already exists http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/newelection/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
